Latest Project Array.name: Pablo Marte - Website
Latest Project Array.description:
I developed this digital platform for musician and author Pablo Marte to centralize his literary, musical, and photographic work. The primary goal was to establish a clear and professional brand identity, organizing all his creative content in a single space.

On the technical side, I used Next.js and Tailwind CSS, incorporating libraries like React Bits and HeroUI to build a modern and functional interface. I focused on optimizing technical SEO and site performance to ensure visibility in search engines and a smooth navigation experience.

The application is deployed on Firebase and integrates Cloud Firestore for real-time data management. The project followed an iterative process with constant communication to define a visual hierarchy that balanced a clean aesthetic with the technical requirements of the site.
